experience.description: Nunc sapien nisi, maximus eleifend hendrerit sit amet, rutrum vel diam. Duis quam nibh, tincidunt eget nunc nec, suscipit pretium dolor.

As a TDP Intern I worked within an agile team as a Software Engineer. As a team we were able to leverage vanilla JavaScript, HTML/CSS, jQuery, and also Node.JS to create a web application and a RESTful API hosted in AWS. A dynamic Python script was also implemented to change a LED light connected to a Raspberry Pi to determine what clinical operation was occuring in our web application. Some other tech that was used was MySQL, Bootstrap, and Express
